title: Happily Ever After
description: Meet Prince Maxon before he fell in love with America, and a girl named Amberly before she became queen. See the Selection through the eyes of a guard who watched his first love drift away and a girl who fell for a boy who wasn’t the prince. This must-have companion to the Selection series includes four novellas—two of which are only available in print in this collection—as well as exclusive bonus content.Includes:The PrinceThe GuardThe Queen (in print only in this collection)The Favorite (in print only in this collection)Exclusive new scenes from The Selection, The Elite, and The OneIntroductions to each novella from Kiera CassA map of Illéa and other illustrations
author: Kiera Cass
